ygData.subject: Re: What to do with a level 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ive only been to the Main Treehouse twice, its not bad, but I spend most of my time on the East and west Hill Treehouses, 3-4 spawns, with enuff harriers and
ygData.messageBody:
Ive only been to the Main Treehouse twice, its not bad, but I spend most of
my time on the East and west Hill Treehouses, 3-4 spawns, with enuff
harriers and Avocets mixed in to keep everyone happy.

Jaezebel Moonsong
-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 5:36 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] What to do with a level 24?


>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>Also if you are hunting Aviaks you want to have a Ranger in your group.
>Since on my server (Karana) the Treehouse is majorly camped, but there are
>many wandering Avaiks in the area between the Treehouse and Paw. When I
>used to slow there I would just zoom around with Selo's till I found one.
>This was still quicker (and more fun) then fighting over the static spawn
at
>the Treehouse :)
>
>Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
>
>>From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] What to do with a level 24?
>>Date: Mon, 20 Sep 1999 17:35:16 -0400
>>
>>From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
>>
>>Myself and another bard on my server, seem to be doing well in South
Karana
>>fighting Aviaks in and around the Aviak City... We can solo Darters and
>>Rooks, and in groups we can take harriers and Avocets, these things are
>>rich
>>also. I went from just hitting 21 to well into 23 so far in a couple of
>>days.
>>
>>Jaezebel
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
>>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 4:48 PM
>>Subject: [eqbards] What to do with a level 24?
>>
>>
>> >From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>> >
>> >I can sympathize with you because I am finding myself in the same
>>situation.
>> >Since I made 22d level a few weeks back, I have died more times since
>>then
>> >than I did from 18-22 combined (at least it seems that way). I made 23d
>> >level a week ago. Since then, I have died and gone back to 22d level
>>three
>> >times. Finally made it back to 23d yesterday but my progress towards
24th
>> >level is going extremely slow. Its like taking two steps backward for
>>every
>> >one step forward. My tactics, gained from reading this list, haven't
>> >changed so it has to be something else. A couple of times my death has
>>been
>> >due to being in a bad group. One time it was strictly my fault. I made
>>the
>> >mistake of playing Denon's in the basement of HighKeep. I wasn't
getting
>> >any messages that people were casting so I didn't think the z-axis bug
>>would
>> >affect me. That was a bad assumption and I got killed by the guards.
>> >
>> >I'm beginning to think soloing may be good for me for the time being.
>> >Someone mentioned soloing the aviaks in Rathe Mountains as an option.
>>Does
>> >anyone have any other recommendations?
>> >
>> >Galtin of E'ci
>> >
>> >> Does anyone have any suggestions about where to go to earn solo
>>experience
>> >> at my level (24)?
>> >> Does anyone have any tactical suggestions to permit me to keep my butt
>> >> alive when grouped with mediocre
>> >> players?
>> >>
>> >> I hate playing for eight hours and earning only one bubble of
>>experience.
>> >> Or less.
>> >>
>> >>
>> >
>> >
>
>
>
